parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Path and name of the part document to which to save the selected weldment member, solid body, or surface body

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: How to save the document as defined in swSaveAsOptions_e

parameters.name: CutListProps
parameters.description: Option for transferring the cut list of the selected weldment member, solid body, or surface body to the new part as defined in swCutListTransferOptions_e

parameters.name: OverrideTemplate
parameters.description: True to override the part template with the template specified by TemplatePath, false to not

parameters.name: TemplatePath
parameters.description: Path to part template; valid only if OverrideTemplate is true

parameters.name: Errors
parameters.description: Save errors as defined in swFileSaveError_e

parameters.name: Warnings
parameters.description: Warnings or extra information generated during the save operation as defined in swFileSaveWarning_e

title: IPartDoc.SaveToFile3
description: Saves the selected weldment member, surface body, or solid body to another part document.
signature:
System.Boolean SaveToFile3( 
   System.String
Name
,
   System.Int32
Options
,
   System.Int32
CutListProps
,
   System.Boolean
OverrideTemplate
,
   System.String
TemplatePath
,
   out System.Int32
Errors
,
   out System.Int32
Warnings
)

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Path and name of the part document to which to save the selected weldment member, solid body, or surface body

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: How to save the document as defined in swSaveAsOptions_e

parameters.name: CutListProps
parameters.description: Option for transferring the cut list of the selected weldment member, solid body, or surface body to the new part as defined in swCutListTransferOptions_e

parameters.name: OverrideTemplate
parameters.description: True to override the part template with the template specified by TemplatePath, false to not

parameters.name: TemplatePath
parameters.description: Path to part template; valid only if OverrideTemplate is true

parameters.name: Errors
parameters.description: Save errors as defined in swFileSaveError_e

parameters.name: Warnings
parameters.description: Warnings or extra information generated during the save operation as defined in swFileSaveWarning_e

returns: True if the save is successful, false if not
remarks:
The difference between this method and the now obsolete IPartDoc::SaveToFile2 is that this method allows you to specify in CutListProps how the cut list properties of the selected weldment member of a weldment part are transferred to the saved part.
Before calling this method, select a weldment member, surface body, or solid body in the FeatureManager design tree.
